entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
